title: IS_ALPHA
description: Returns TRUE if the provided string contains only alphabetic characters (A-Z, a-z); otherwise, returns FALSE.
examples:
IS_ALPHA("Hello World")
-- Returns FALSE, as it contains a space

IS_ALPHA("Hello123")
-- Returns FALSE, as it contains numbers

tips.text: Returns FALSE if the string is empty.
Any numbers, spaces, or symbols will result in FALSE.
